name: Pulsus Solaris
description:
Credits:

Music and SFX: aokay (https://itch.io/profile/aokayofficial)

Art: KaGG (kagg.ivan@gmail.com) 

Programming & Game Design: Tobaz

When you find yourself trapped in a dungeon, there is only one way out. Armed with a gun it's up to you to fight your way through. Use the sun to your advantage and find the exit.
